posts.title: Jazz Paper Cups
posts.content: Give yourself a dose of nostalgia while you quench your thirst by drinking out of these jazz paper cups. Each cup comes with a wet wax coating to provide enhanced rigidity and features the classic purple and teal design that was popularized in the ’90s.

posts.title: Harry Potter Pop-Up Book
posts.content: Experience all the magic of the wizardry world when you begin reading the Harry Potter pop-up book. This brilliantly illustrated book provides a detailed account of the perilous adventures Harry Potter and the gang encounter through their studies at Hogwarts.

posts.title: Sony Playstation Wallet
posts.content: Show off your gamer roots every time you pull out the Sony Playstation wallet to make a purchase. This officially licensed wallet – made from durable PVC and polyester – features a first generation Playstation design that all gamers will love.

posts.title: Butter Mill Grate
posts.content: The butter mill grate is the must-have kitchen appliance that instantly transforms any hard brick of butter into small soft swirls of buttery goodness that are ideal for spreading over your toast or bagel without tearing the bread to pieces.

posts.title: Poop Odor Removing Toilet Fan
posts.content: You can finally throw out those aerosols and deodorizing sprays once and for all once you outfit your porcelain throne with this poop odor removing toilet fan. This compact device removes 99% of bacteria and fungi, eliminating the foul smell created by excrement.

posts.title: Thor’s Hammer USB Drive
posts.content: When important documents or classified S.H.I.E.L.D. documents need saving, enlist help from the gods by saving them on the Thor’s Hammer USB drive. While in possession of Thor’s Hammer, you’ll have unlimited power in addition to 8 GB at your disposal.

posts.title: Ice And Snow Traction Cleats
posts.content: Transform nearly any pair of shoes into rugged hiking boots by outfitting them using these ice and snow traction cleats. Tested safe from breakage in temperatures as low as -41 degrees Fahrenheit, they fit over your existing shoes to provide 360 degree traction.

posts.title: Raspberry Pi Touchscreen
posts.content: Take your credit-card sized PC to the next level by upgrading it using the Raspberry Pi touchscreen. You’ll be able to accomplish various tasks by easily navigating the 2.8 inch display with 320×240 16-bit color pixels and resistive touch overlay.

posts.title: Candy Cigarettes
posts.content: Look like coolest kid on the block without risking lung cancer by chomping down on some of these candy cigarettes. Each pack contains ten slim and sweet candy sticks that come in colorful cartons modeled after vintage cigarette packs.

posts.title: SockDock Sock Organizer
posts.content: Ensure you never loose another sock during the washing process by placing them on the SockDock sock organizer. After placing your dirty socks between the adjustable sliders, the entire thing can be tossed into the washer and dryer for maximum convenience.

posts.title: Adjustable Pull-Out Container Organizer
posts.content: Bring order to your kitchen by keeping your tupperware neatly arranged with the adjustable pull-out container organizer. Designed for 18” and 24” base cabinets, it features a handy peg board floor design that allows you to customize the organizer to fit your needs.

posts.title: Cram Session Snack Survival Kit
posts.content: Give yourself a fighting chance during exams by with help from the cram session snack survival kit. It comes jam packed with over 24 cram session essentials like pens, pencils, index cards, and loads of sugary treats to keep you awake during those marathon sessions.
